external_games.name: The Sims 4 Cats and Dogs Plus My First Pet Stuff Bundle

name: The Sims 4: Cats and Dogs Plus My First Pet Stuff Bundle
summary: Get The Sims 4 Cats and Dogs plus My First Pet Stuff content in one great bundle! You're in control of creating a variety of cats and dogs, and care for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian. Add My First Pet Stuff for your Sims to show love for Cats and Dogs while welcoming a new small animal.
